p: The EODa showed a significant difference with the 4 mg/mL concentration, when compared to the control and the 1 mg/mL concentration, during all reading times (between 1 and 8 h). From the third hour onwards, a difference between the 2 mg/mL concentration and the control was registered, a fact that was only identified after the sixth hour of reading with the 1 mg/mL concentration, as shown in Figure 4.
